about.title: About Me
about.summary: As a passionate Frontend Developer, I specialize in building responsive, user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I transform design concepts into seamless, interactive experiences. I focus on writing clean, efficient code while staying current with emerging trends and best practices in web development. I have strong time management skills and have worked as a freelancer for over a year, delivering quality projects on time and collaborating effectively with clients.

projects.title: Projects
projects.calculatorDesc: A clean, functional calculator with basic mathematical operations and a responsive design that works across all devices.
projects.clockDesc: A minimalist clock application displaying current time with a stylish interface and animated elements.
projects.exchangeRateDesc: Real-time currency exchange rate application with conversion features and historical rate tracking.
projects.weatherDesc: Weather forecasting application with current conditions, daily forecasts, and location-based weather data.
projects.memesDesc: A fun application for browsing and sharing popular memes with categorization and search functionality.
projects.moviesDesc: Comprehensive movies and series application with search, filtering, and detailed information about films and TV shows.
projects.ecommerceDesc: Full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, checkout process, and includes an admin dashboard.
projects.outpatientDesc: An outpatient management system that allows patients to book and cancel appointments, chat with doctors,and includes an admin,doctor,patient dashboard and lets doctors manage daily schedules.
projects.marketDesc: A comprehensive online marketplace built with Next.js, allowing users to browse products, add them to a cart, and complete purchases seamlessly. It includes an admin dashboard for adding, editing, or deleting products, viewing the total number of users, identifying the last user who logged in, and tracking the latest product added, with a responsive design and modern user interface.
